original_text: And they gave him a piece of a cake of figs, and two clusters of raisins: and when he had eaten, his spirit came again to him: for he had eaten no bread, nor drunk any water, three days and three nights.
korean_text: 그에게 무화과 뭉치에서 뗀 덩이 하나와 건포도 두 송이를 주었으니 그가 밤낮 사흘 동안 떡도 먹지 못하였고 물도 마시지 못하였음이니라 그가 먹고 정신을 차리매

sentences.original_text: And they gave him a piece of a cake of figs
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그에게 무화과 떡 한 조각을 주었고

sentences.original_text: his spirit came again to him
for he had eaten no bread
